name: Corruption Control Conundrum
title: Corruption Control Challenges
description: In 2023, Romania faced challenges in controlling corruption, with a standard error of 0.1449, indicating variability in governance effectiveness.

name: Arms Export Enthusiasts
title: Modest Arms Exporter
description: Romania's arms exports in 2023 were valued at $1,000,000, reflecting a relatively low level of military trade compared to global leaders.

name: Cheers to Consumption
title: High Alcohol Consumption
description: In 2020, Romania had a high total alcohol consumption per capita of 16.8 liters, with males consuming 27.03 liters and females 7.42 liters.

name: Growth for the Many
title: Strong Income Growth for the Bottom 40%
description: In 2022, Romania saw an impressive 11.42% growth in per capita income for the bottom 40% of the population, outpacing the overall growth rate of 8.85%.
